0.title: Welcome to AGI System
0.description: This is an artificial intelligence system with self-awareness and autonomous learning capabilities. The system includes 11 core models working together to achieve human brain-like functionality.

1.title: Model Management
1.description: The Manager Model (A) coordinates all sub-model tasks, supporting multiple interaction methods including voice, text, and images. Model configuration and monitoring can be done through the main interface.

2.title: Training and Control
2.description: The system supports both individual model training and joint training. The training control panel allows selecting models for training and setting training parameters.

3.title: Real-time Monitoring
3.description: The monitoring dashboard provides real-time system status, model performance, and resource usage. Supports real-time data stream viewing and model restart operations.

4.title: Multi-language Support
4.description: The system supports five language interface switches: Chinese, English, German, Japanese, and Russian. All documentation and comments are bilingual in Chinese and English.
